name: Wetland + Open Water Area in Floodplain (%)
shortName: Wetland + Open Water Area in Floodplain (%)
functionStatement: Wetlands and ponded areas provide storage and retention, supporting baseflow and flood attenuation.
descriptionMarkdown: Percent of floodplain area classified as wetland and/or open water. Higher is better.
howToMeasureMarkdown: Intersect floodplain polygon with NWI and open-water layers; compute % area.

inputs.label: Wetland + Open Water Area in Floodplain (%)
inputs.helpMarkdown: NWI wetlands + mapped open water/ponds within floodplain polygon.

sourceMetadata.metricDataSource: NWI wetlands + mapped open water/ponds within floodplain polygon.
sourceMetadata.metricStatement: Wetlands and ponded areas provide storage and retention, supporting baseflow and flood attenuation.
sourceMetadata.description: Percent of floodplain area classified as wetland and/or open water. Higher is better.
sourceMetadata.howToMeasure: Intersect floodplain polygon with NWI and open-water layers; compute % area.
referencesRaw: SFARI rapid assessment; National Wetlands Inventory (NWI); local hydrography layers.

stratifications.name: Proposed (derived from SFARI rapid curves) - Interpret against regional historic wetland prevalence; use O/E where wetlands are naturally scarce.
stratifications.stratification: Interpret against regional historic wetland prevalence; use O/E where wetlands are naturally scarce.
